Description:
As agents become increasingly prolific and capable, joining every type of workflow, organizations must embrace a frontier firm mindset, where teams supported by agents operate with intelligence on tap. This session explores how Agent 365 extends your existing infrastructure and apps to agents, so users can find, leverage, and optimize secure, productive agents to power your business transformation.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-copilotagents ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Ray Smith \* Caroline Stanford ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event. BRK298 | English (US) Breakout | Intermediate (200) #MSIgnite, #Copilotandagentsatwork

Chapters: 0:00 - Example Use Cases: Automating Repetitive Work Tasks 00:08:10 - Introducing Agent 365 as Microsoft's Agent Management Solution 00:09:17 - Introduction of Agent 365 availability and purpose as a unified control plane for all AI agents 00:16:55 - Demonstrations of Glean and Genspark integrations showcasing practical use cases within Microsoft 365 00:22:09 - Introduction of Ray Smith and focus on security and governance 00:23:36 - Setup for demo using procurement manager and IT admin personas 00:30:47 - Shift to handling customer purchase requests via email 00:33:08 - Human-in-the-loop approval and automated purchase order creation 00:34:18 - Observability feature builds trust through agent transparency
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Power agents to scale your frontier workforce with Agent 365 | BRK298
